briefdescription.para: Variable denoting whether this body is the global frame origin (1 if true, 0 if false, -1 if not yet set)
Current state.
Current state with long double precision.
Current state.
Current state with long double precision.
Time at which state was last set from ephemeris.

detaileddescription.para: Class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin (as typically created by setGlobalFrameBodyEphemerides function).

briefdescription.para: Current rotation from the global to the body-fixed frame.

detaileddescription.para: Current first derivative w.r.t. time of the rotation matrix from the global to the body-fixed frame.

briefdescription.para: Current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the global frame.
Current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the body-fixed frame.
Mass of body (default set to zero, calculated from GravityFieldModel when it is set).
Function returning body mass as a function of time.
Body moment-of-inertia tensor.
Body scaled mean moment of inertia.
Ephemeris of body.
Gravity field model of body.
Object containing all variations in the gravity field of this body.
Atmosphere model of body.
Shape model of body.
Aerodynamic coefficient model of body.
Object used for calculating current aerodynamic angles, altitude, etc.
Rotation model of body.
Model to compute the rotation of the body based on the current state of the environment, only valid during propagation.
List of radiation pressure models for the body, with the sources bodies as key.
Predefined iterator for efficiency purposes.
List of ground station objects on Body.
Container object with hardware systems present on/in body (typically only non-nullptr for a vehicle).
Boolean defining whether the body is currently being propagated, or not.
Constructor for a body.

detaileddescription.para:
Constructor for a body, sets current state (with zero default value).
state
Current state of body at initialization (default = zeroes).

briefdescription.para: Function to retrieve the class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to retrieve the class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin
Class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin

briefdescription.para: Function to set the class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin
ephemerisFrameToBaseFrame
Class returning the state of this body's ephemeris origin w.r.t. the global origin

briefdescription.para: Get current state.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current state vector.
Current state.

briefdescription.para: Set current state of body manually.

detaileddescription.para:
Set current state of body manually, which must be in the global frame. Note that this function does not set the currentLongState_, use the setLongState when needing the use of the long precision current state.
state
Current state of the body that is set.

briefdescription.para: Set current state of body manually in long double precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Set current state of body manually in long double precision. State must be in the global frame. Note that this function sets both the currentState_ and currentLongState_ variables (currentLongState_ directly and currentState_ by casting the input to double entries).
longState
Current state of the body that is set, in long double precision.

briefdescription.para: Templated function to set the state manually.

detaileddescription.para:
Templated function to set the state manually, calls either setState or setLongState function.
state
Current state of the body that is set, with StateScalarType precision.
Templated function to set the current state of the body from its ephemeris and global-to-ephemeris-frame function.

Templated function to set the current state of the body from its ephemeris and global-to-ephemeris-frame function. It sets both the currentState_ and currentLongState_ variables. F FUndamental coputation is done on state with StateScalarType precision as a function of TimeType time
time
Time at which the global state is to be set.
Templated function to get the current state of the body from its ephemeris and global-to-ephemeris-frame function.

Templated function to get the current state of the body from its ephemeris and global-to-ephemeris-frame function. It calls the setStateFromEphemeris state, resetting the currentState_ / currentLongState_ variables, and returning the state with the requested precision
time
Time at which to evaluate states.
State at requested time
Templated function to get the current berycentric state of the body from its ephemeris andcglobal-to-ephemeris-frame function.

Templated function to get the current berycentric state of the body from its ephemeris andcglobal-to-ephemeris-frame function. It calls the setStateFromEphemeris state, resetting the currentBarycentricState_ / currentBarycentricLongState_ variables, and returning the state with the requested precision. This function can ONLY be called if this body is the global frame origin, otherwise an exception is thrown
time
Time at which to evaluate states.
Barycentric State at requested time

briefdescription.para: Get current rotational state.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current rotational state vector.
Current rotational state.

briefdescription.para: Get current position.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current position vector.
Current position.

briefdescription.para: Get current velocity.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current velocity vector.
Current velocity.

briefdescription.para: Get current state, in long double precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current state vector, in long double precision

briefdescription.para: Get current position, in long double precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current position vector, in long double precision

briefdescription.para: Get current velocity, in long double precision.

detaileddescription.para:
Returns the internally stored current velocity vector.

briefdescription.para: Templated function to retrieve the state.

detaileddescription.para:
Templated function to retrieve the state, calls either getState or getLongState function.
Current state of the body, with StateScalarType precision.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the rotation from global to body-fixed frame at given time.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the rotation from global to body-fixed frame at given time, using the rotationalEphemeris_ member object
time
Time at which the rotation is to be retrieved.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the rotation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame at given time.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the rotation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame at given time, using the rotationalEphemeris_ member object
time
Time at which the rotation matrix derivative is to be retrieved.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the angular velocity vector in the global frame at given time.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the angular velocity vector in the global frame at given time, using the rotationalEphemeris_ member object
time
Time at which the angular velocity vector in the global frame is to be retrieved.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the full rotational state at given time.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the full rotational state at (rotation from global to body-fixed frame rotation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame and angular velocity vector in the global frame) at given time, using the rotationalEphemeris_ member object.
time
Time at which the angular velocity vector in the global frame is to be retrieved.

briefdescription.para: Function to set the full rotational state directly.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the full rotational state directly (rotation from global to body-fixed frame rotation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame and angular velocity vector in the global frame) directly, by providing the current rotational state as input.
currentRotationalStateFromLocalToGlobalFrame
Quaternion from body-fixed to propagation frame (in vector form) and the body's angular velocity vector in body-fixed frame.

briefdescription.para: Get current rotation from body-fixed to inertial frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current rotation from body-fixed to inertial frame, as set from the rotationalEphemeris_ by the setCurrentRotationalStateToLocalFrameFromEphemeris or setCurrentRotationToLocalFrameFromEphemeris function. If body has no rotational ephemeris, an identity quaternion (no rotation) is returned.
Current rotation from body-fixed to inertial frame.

briefdescription.para: Get current rotation from inertial to body-fixed frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current rotation from inertial to body-fixed frame, as set from the rotationalEphemeris_ by the setCurrentRotationalStateToLocalFrameFromEphemeris or setCurrentRotationToLocalFrameFromEphemeris function. If body has no rotational ephemeris, an identity quaternion (no rotation) is returned.
Current rotation from inertial to body-fixed frame.

briefdescription.para: Get current rotational state.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current rotational state, expressed as a quaternion from global to body-fixed frame (in vector form) and the body's angular velocity vector in inertial frame.
Current rotational state in quaternions and rotational velocity.

briefdescription.para: Get current rotation matrix derivative from body-fixed to global frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current rotation matrix derivative from body-fixed frame to global, as set from the rotationalEphemeris_ by the setCurrentRotationalStateToLocalFrameFromEphemeris or setCurrentRotationToLocalFrameDerivativeFromEphemeris function. If body has no rotational ephemeris, an zero matrix (no rotation) is returned.
Current otation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame.

briefdescription.para: Get current rotation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current rotation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame, as set from the rotationalEphemeris_ by the setCurrentRotationalStateToLocalFrameFromEphemeris or setCurrentRotationToLocalFrameDerivativeFromEphemeris function. If body has no rotational ephemeris, an zero matrix (no rotation) is returned.
Current otation matrix derivative from global to body-fixed frame.

briefdescription.para: Get current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the global frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the global frame.
Current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the global frame.

briefdescription.para: Get current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the local frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Get current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the local frame. Transformation from the global to the local frame is done by rotating the vector with the current quaternion to local frame.
Current angular velocity vector for body's rotation, expressed in the local frame.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to set the ephemeris of the body, which is used to represent the (a priori) state history of the body.

briefdescription.para: Function to (re)set the body moment-of-inertia tensor from the gravity field.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to (re)set the body moment-of-inertia tensor from the gravity field, requires only a mean moment of inertia (scaled by mass times reference radius squared). Other data are taken from this body's spherical harmonic gravity field
scaledMeanMomentOfInertia
Mean moment of inertial, divided by (M*R^2), with M the mass of the body and R the reference radius of the gravity field.

briefdescription.para: Function to (re)set the body moment-of-inertia tensor from existing gravity field and mean moment of inertia.

detaileddescription.para:
Function to (re)set the body moment-of-inertia tensor from existing gravity field and mean moment of inertia.
printWarningIfNotSet
Boolean to denote whether a warning is to be printed if scaled mean moment is not defined.

briefdescription.para: Function to recompute the internal variables of member variables that depend on the ephemerides bodies.

detaileddescription.para: Function to recompute the internal variables of member variables that depend on the ephemerides of this and other bodies. This function is typically called after equations of motion have been computed and set in environment to ensure full model consistency.

briefdescription.para: Function to indicate that the state needs to be recomputed on next call to setStateFromEphemeris.

detaileddescription.para: Function to reset the time to which the state was last updated using setStateFromEphemeris function to nan, thereby singalling that it needs to be recomputed upon next call.

briefdescription.para: Templated function to set the state manually.
Templated function to set the state manually.
Body class representing the properties of a celestial body (natural or artificial).

detaileddescription.para: Body class representing the properties of a celestial body (natural or artificial). By storing all properties of bodies (ephemeris, rotation, gravity, etc.) in a set of body objects, the simulation environment can be defined in a clear and modular way. To create body objects, the createBodies.h function provides a range of functionality. The createAccelerationModels.h file provides functions to use body objects to create acceleration objects.
